PayPalPayment.PayPalText: The world's most loved way to pay and get paid.
PayPalPayment.PayPalSettingsError: Error in PayPal API settings. Please contact administrator.
PayPalPayment.ProcessPaymentCaptureRequest: The capture request is done, actual capturing must be done on PayPal
PayPalPayment.ProcessPaymentStatusCompleted: This shopping cart has been paid already on PayPal
PayPalPayment.ProcessPaymentSetExpressCheckoutError: Error when call SetExpressCheckout to PayPal API
PayPalPayment.CommitTranErrorCartNull: Cart is null while processing successful transaction redirected back from PayPal
PayPalPayment.CommitTranErrorCartReset: Cart is reset while processing PayPal transaction
PayPalPayment.PaymentCancelMessage: Your payment is declined or cancelled. Please try again or choose another payment method
